org.zoolu.net

Class TcpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.zoolu.net.TcpServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TcpServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    TcpServer implements a TCP server wainting for incoming connection.
